me.prettyprint.hector.api.ConsistencyLevelPolicy

Packages that use ConsistencyLevelPolicy

Uses of ConsistencyLevelPolicy in me.prettyprint.cassandra.model
 

Classes in me.prettyprint.cassandra.model that implement ConsistencyLevelPolicy
 class AllOneConsistencyLevelPolicy
          A simple implementation of ConsistencyLevelPolicy which returns ONE as the desired consistency level for both reads and writes.
 class ConfigurableConsistencyLevel
          Configurable and Runtime adjustable ConsistencyLevelPolicy
 class QuorumAllConsistencyLevelPolicy
          A simple implementation of ConsistencyLevelPolicy which returns QUORUM as the desired consistency level for both reads and writes.
